title: The Murder Of The Rev. James Reeb
description: In 1965, the Rev. James Reeb was murdered in Selma, Ala. No one was ever held to account. We return to the town where it happened, searching for new leads in an old story.
copyright: Copyright 2019 NPR - For Personal Use Only
